statements: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND last_login > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR username = 'manager' ORDER BY last_login;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, roles.role_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id LEFT JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;

SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id;
